special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{1}{G}{W} Page 8
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
{1}{W}{U} Page 29
Each creature you control with a counter on it can’t be blocked.
